GLOBAL.INTERNET_TEXT: You need a connection to the internet for this app to work. Restart the app if you belief you have internet.
LOGIN.TITLE: Login
LOGIN.SIGNUP_HINT: If you're a new user, please sign up.
SIGNUP.MISSING_INFO_ERROR: Please enter your mail address and password!
SIGNUP.EXPLANATION: You need to use a mail-domain which is shared by your collegues in order to be matched to the same group.
TIME.WELCOME: Welcome to Lunch Date! You need to join a group in order to participate in communal lunches.
TIME.WELCOME_EXPLANATION: At the moment this works by using a verified work mail-address or asking the group admin. In the released version you will be able to create and moderate groups using this app.
TIME.CREATETEXT_2: to tell your colleagues todays lunch time
TIME.SHOUT_TEXT: Do you want to ask your collegues to go for lunch in 5 minutes?
MEAL.TITLE: Under Construction
MEAL.EXPLANATION: Planned feature: swipe to find todays most suitable meal
SETTINGS.NAME: Your name
SETTINGS.NEED_NAME: You need to choose a public name in order to select a lunch date.
SETTINGS.ABOUT_TEXT:
noun
1. A fruit that is traditionally shared with coworkers at lunchtime.
2. A set time to meet people for lunch.
